title: Fix Camera Blocking Bug
description: Verify ArView.kt layout order, ensure ArRenderer clears to transparent, and verify setZOrderMediaOverlay(true) on GLSurfaceView.

title: Refine Target Evolution (Snap to Target)
description: Update TargetEvolutionEngine to use approxPolyDP and implement 'Snap to Target' interaction in MaskingScreen.

title: Implement Basic Drawing Tools (Brush/Eraser)
description: Implement DrawingCanvas with Brush and Eraser support and add Toolbar UI.

title: Implement Advanced Drawing Tools (Liquify/Heal/Burn)
description: Implement processLiquify and processInpaint in MobileGS (JNI) and connect to UI.

title: Implement Export Manager (Single/Layer)
description: Implement ExportManager with Single Image and Layer export support.

title: Implement Teleological SLAM (solvePnP Loop)
description: Ensure TeleologicalLoop correctly updates MobileGS camera pose using solvePnP.

title: Implement Passive Triangulation (Stereo Depth)
description: Implement StereoDepthProvider using Camera2 logical multi-camera API and OpenCV StereoSGBM in JNI.
